method.text: Place sugar and water in a small pan, without stirring. Leave for 2-3 min until the sugar has dissolved.
Bring to the boil and cook for 3-4 min, or until mixture turns pale brown.
Remove from heat. Pour the caramel into a greased 750 ml mould. Move the mould from side to side, until the sides and base are coated.
Beat eggs into the milk along with the remaining ingredients.
Strain the mixture into the prepared mould.
Cover with foil and steam for 30-40 min, or until set. Leave to cool. Chill well overnight. Serve cut into slices .
